entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -9.5°C

Visibility: 9.7 km
Humidity: 94 %

entry.title: Sunday night: Periods of snow. Temperature rising to minus 8 by morning.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow. Amount 2 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature rising to minus 8 by morning. Wind chill minus 18 this evening and minus 11 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Sunday 15 January 2023

entry.title: Monday: Periods of snow. High minus 7.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow with risk of freezing drizzle. Amount 2 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 7. Wind chill near minus 12. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Sunday 15 January 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 13. POP 40%
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending in the evening then cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Risk of freezing drizzle early in the evening. Wind becoming north 30 km/h after midnight. Low minus 13. Wind chill minus 12 in the evening and minus 23 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Sunday 15 January 2023
